title: Reflective learning-based e-portfolio design workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Customized course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to strengthen mathematics education competencies. Provides real-time collaboration and project development environments using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their own mathematics instructional practices and systematically organize them in an e-portfolio by applying reflective learning principles
Learners can collect, manage, and visualize formative assessment materials using Moodle-based e-portfolio templates
Learners can integrate digital artifacts (graphs, models, etc.) reflecting peer feedback into e-portfolios to demonstrate growth trajectories
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
